Title: London Town
Writer: Matt Brown (screenplay by), Sonya Gildea (based on the screenplay "Untitled Joe Strummer Project" by), Kirsten Sheridan (based on the screenplay "Untitled Joe Strummer Project" by)
Actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Daniel Huttlestone, Dougray Scott, Natascha McElhone
Plot: In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever.
Production: Dutch Tilt Film, IFC Films, Killer Films
